name: FPS: Playgrounds
description:
Hi im Jimmy (czos)This is a early prototype. Shoot things around and have fun! There is a giant soccer ball, ragbots, cubes and others! You can also improve you aiming.

***IMPORTANT***  PLEASE READ

Here are controls for game.

WASD to move (+ Shift to sprint), mouse to look, left mouse click to fire, right mouse click to aim, F and Q is knife attack, G is grenade, spacebar is jump and number keys to change timestamp.
